name: The Legend of Sweeper
description:
The following project was developed as part of the Search For a Star Games Programming 2022 challenge. We were given a code base with minesweeper implemented and had to build upon that.  That's where this crazy crossover idea, Minesweeper X Zelda, came from.  

All the coding and art was done by me. I used some free sound effects and songs from around the web:

https://evilduckk.itch.io/sound-assets-for-your-adventure-game

https://timbeek.itch.io/free-retro-boss-music/download/eyJleHBpcmVzIjoxNjQ0MDc1O...

https://dabolka.itch.io/sfx-pack-2-free

https://freesound.org/people/Kreastricon62/sounds/327894/

https://freesound.org/people/DeVern/sounds/517664/

https://freesound.org/people/JapanYoshiTheGamer/sounds/361252/

ControlsMoveWASDMineLeft MoussePlace FlagRight Mousse

Check out the Post Mortem design corrections on the Dev Logs tab, I will keep updating it as I get feedback and conduct play testing.

Hope you Enjoy!
